{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Loopcomm |model=LP-8186C |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=09/25/2009 |manuf_country=Taiwan |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=VYTLP-8186C |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8186 |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V281620FTP-6 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8186 |wi1_chip2_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Realtek |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.254 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} '''Barricade b/g 2.4GHz 54Mbps''' ''Wireless Cable/DSL Broadband Router''
[www.loopcomm.com/front/bin/ptdetail.phtml?Part=LP-8186C Product page] "LOO0019 Rev:1.1" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :The radio is pictured as using a [https://www.microchip.com/wwwproducts/Devices.aspx?dDocName=en550350 '''Microchip''' ('''SST''') SST12LP15A high-gain power amplifier]. Alternate models of LP-8186S and LP-8186CH are also specified in the FCC test report. Additional specifications, per '''Loopcomm''''s datasheet, follow... *Dimensions (LxWxH): [[Dimensions::146 mm x 100 mm x 24 mm]] *Weight: [[Weight::245 g]] The power adapter shown in the FCC photos is a '''DVE''' DSA-12G-12 FUS 120120 (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz, 0.3A -> 12VDC, 1A).
